name: Divorce Petition
description: Legal petition to initiate divorce proceedings

sections.title: PETITION FOR DISSOLUTION OF MARRIAGE
sections.content:
IN THE {court_name} COURT
FOR THE COUNTY OF {county_name}
STATE OF ____________

Case No. {case_number}

In re the Marriage of:

{petitioner_name},
Petitioner,

and

{respondent_name},
Respondent.

sections.title: PETITION FOR DISSOLUTION OF MARRIAGE
sections.content: COMES NOW the Petitioner, {petitioner_name}, by and through counsel, {petitioner_attorney}, and petitions this Court for dissolution of marriage, and in support thereof states as follows:

sections.title: 1. JURISDICTION AND VENUE
sections.content:
Petitioner resides at {petitioner_address}. Petitioner has been a resident of the State of ____________ for at least _____ months immediately preceding the filing of this Petition.

Respondent resides at {respondent_address}.

Venue is proper in this Court.

sections.title: 2. MARRIAGE INFORMATION
sections.content: Petitioner and Respondent were married on {marriage_date} in ____________, and have been separated since {separation_date}.

sections.title: 3. GROUNDS
sections.content:
This marriage should be dissolved on the grounds that:

{grounds_for_divorce}

sections.title: 4. CHILDREN
sections.content:
The following children were born of this marriage or were legally adopted by the parties:

{children_of_marriage}

sections.title: 5. CUSTODY AND PARENTING TIME
sections.content:
Petitioner requests the following custody and parenting time arrangement:

{custody_requests}

sections.title: 6. CHILD SUPPORT
sections.content:
Petitioner requests child support as follows:

{child_support_requests}

sections.title: 7. PROPERTY DIVISION
sections.content:
Petitioner requests the following division of marital property and debts:

{property_division_requests}

sections.title: 8. SPOUSAL SUPPORT/ALIMONY
sections.content:
Petitioner requests spousal support/alimony as follows:

{alimony_requests}

sections.title: 9. NAME CHANGE
sections.content:
Petitioner requests the following name change:

{name_change_request}

sections.title: 10. RESTRAINING ORDERS
sections.content:
Petitioner requests the following restraining orders:

{restraining_order_request}

sections.title: 11. OTHER RELIEF
sections.content:
Petitioner requests the following additional relief:

{other_relief_requested}

sections.title: WHEREFORE
VERIFICATION
sections.content:
I, {petitioner_name}, being duly sworn upon my oath, state that I am the Petitioner in the above-entitled matter, that I have read the foregoing Petition for Dissolution of Marriage and know the contents thereof, and that the statements contained therein are true and correct to the best of my knowledge, information, and belief.

Dated this {filing_date}.

________________________
{petitioner_name}, Petitioner

________________________
{petitioner_attorney}, Attorney for Petitioner (if applicable)
